TEI.2.document_title: A. McNair to Stephen F. Austin, 04-11-1822

barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 1, pp. 493-494

div1.p: This will be handed you by Mr Robert Brotherton a young Gentleman who I have been acquainted with for many years he visits your settlement with a view to Locate himself and his mother and family you will find Mr [Robert] Brotherton a young Gentleman of honor and integrity and an industrious farmer, I hope he may meet your approbation and friendship
I have the Honour to be your friend and Sevt
